title: Uruguay
summary: Uruguay is a country in South America. The capital is Montevideo. Population: 3.5 million. Area: 181,034 km².

images.alt: The flag of Uruguay is composed of nine equal horizontal bands of white alternating with blue, with a white square superimposed in the canton. In the white square is a yellow sun bearing a human face — the Sun of May — from which sixteen rays extend. The sun's rays alternate between triangular and wavy.

attribution.note: National flags are in the public domain.
